sql.nuance_etat_monodim:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS		
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.PRIXART<>'O' AND ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=0 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''
						ORDER  BY ARTICLEM.ETATMAT,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.NUANCE;
sql.nuance_etat:
--recuperation des nuances etat tout type d article confondus, seuls la famille 3 generer des matieres
						SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS		
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=16 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						WHERE NUANCE<>''  AND (FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 OR  FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=14 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5)  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' 
						AND (UnitePrix='m'	or UnitePrix='Kg' or UnitePrix='le cent' or UnitePrix='u')						
						--WHERE  ARTICLEM.PRIXART<>'O' AND ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''
						ORDER  BY ARTICLEM.ETATMAT,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.NUANCE;
sql.Rond:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=16 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='';
sql.TubeRond:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=16 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='';
sql.TubeCarre:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=14 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=14  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='';
sql.TubeRectangle:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=14 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=14 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='';
sql.Flat:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS,
						DIMENSIO.DIM1+ DIMENSIO.DIM2 as SUMMULTI,
						DIM1+ DIM2 as SUMMONO
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=14 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''  ;
sql.Profilspeciaux:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS,
						DIMENSIO.DIM1+ DIMENSIO.DIM2 as SUMMULTI,
						DIM1+ DIM2 as SUMMONO
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=14 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=1 vis
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=7 vischc
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=3 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=4  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=5  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=1  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=14 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=7 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=17 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''  ;
sql.Divers:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART,ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.DIM1 , ARTICLEM.DIM2,ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.DIM4,   
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as DIMENSIO_DIM1,DIMENSIO.DIM2 as DIMENSIO_DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE AS DIMENSIO_IS_COMMERCIAL , 
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS,
						DIMENSIO.DIM1+ DIMENSIO.DIM2 as SUMMULTI,
						DIM1+ DIM2 as SUMMONO
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=14 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=1 vis
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=7 vischc  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=1   AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=7
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=6 ipn?
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=12 L
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=15 IPN
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE   FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=3 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=6 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=15 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=12 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=4  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=5  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=14 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS!=17 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''  ;
sql.Obsolet_nuance_etat:
--recuperation des nuances etat tout type d article confondus, seuls la famille 3 generer des matieres
						SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.DESA1, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS		
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=3 tole/plat
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=17 tube rectangulaire
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=16 tube carre
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=4 rond
						-- famille.DIMENSIONS=5 tube rond
						WHERE NUANCE<>''  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 OR  FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=14 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''
						--WHERE  ARTICLEM.PRIXART<>'O' AND ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''
						ORDER  BY ARTICLEM.ETATMAT,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.NUANCE;
sql.Obsolet_nuance_etat_multidim:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS as TYPE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat as CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite AS DENSITE,
						CONCAT (' Prix ',ARTICLEM.PRIXART,' Euros/', ARTICLEM.UnitePrix ) As MATERIAL_COMMENTS		
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.PRIXART<>'O' AND ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''
						ORDER  BY ARTICLEM.ETATMAT,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.NUANCE;
sql.obsolet_Flat-MultiDim:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS THICKNESS, ARTICLEM.DIM2 , ARTICLEM.DIM3,ARTICLEM.CHUTE, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2 AS LARGEUR, DIMENSIO.CHUTE

						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						
						WHERE  FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1;
sql.Obsolet_Flat-MonoDim:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS LNG, ARTICLEM.DIM2 AS LARGEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM3 AS THICKNESS, ARTICLEM.CHUTE,ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM
						--DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2 AS LARGEUR, DIMENSIO.CHUTE

						FROM ARTICLEM 

						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						--LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						
						WHERE  FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=0;
sql.Obsolet_TubeRond:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2 AS DIAM, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE
						FROM ARTICLEM 
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=5 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';
sql.Obsolete_TubeRectangle:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS LARGEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2 AS HAUTEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM3 AS EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=17 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';
sql.Obsolet_Flat:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS HAUTEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM2 , ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2 AS LARGEUR, DIMENSIO.CHUTE
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
					     LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' 	
						---WHERE ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.COFA='FLAT'  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';
sql.All_Flat:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS LAMONODIM, ARTICLEM.DIM2 AS LOMONODIM , ARTICLEM.DIM3 EPMONODIM, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM AS MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LOMULTIDIM,DIMENSIO.DIM2 AS LAMULTIDIM, DIMENSIO.CHUTE  , ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS EPMULTIDIM
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
					     LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO=''  AND  (	ARTICLEM.DIM1*ARTICLEM.DIM2 <>0 OR DIMENSIO.DIM2*DIMENSIO.DIM1<>0)
						---Attention on filtre sur les dim nulles dans les codes articles
						---WHERE ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.COFA='FLAT'  AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';

						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';
sql.RondMonoDim:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS LNG, ARTICLEM.DIM2 as DIAM, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS,FAMILLE.MULTIDIM						
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						WHERE  FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=0	AND ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=4  AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='';
sql.Obsolet_Profilspeciaux:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as DIAM, ARTICLEM.DIM2 AS EPAISSEUR, ARTICLEM.DIM3, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4, 
						Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2, DIMENSIO.CHUTE
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=6 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';
sql.Toles:
SELECT ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,DIMENSIO.DMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI,DIMENSIO.DIM1 as LNG,DIMENSIO.DIM2 AS LARGEUR,MULTISIT.QTE, DIMENSIO.CHUTE, ARTICLEM.DIM1 as EP,
						Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
						FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS, FAMILLE.MULTIDIM,
						DIMENSIO.AMCLEUNIK AS DIMENSIO_AMCLEUNIK,
						ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.LIBRETXT4,ARTICLEM.COFA, ARTICLEM.DIM2 , ARTICLEM.DIM3
						FROM ARTICLEM
						LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA 
						LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
						LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
						LEFT JOIN DIMENSIO  ON DIMENSIO.	AMCLEUNIK=ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK
						LEFT JOIN MULTISIT  ON MULTISIT.DMCLEUNIK=DIMENSIO.DMCLEUNIK
						WHERE  ARTICLEM.CHUTE<>'O' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=3 AND FAMILLE.MULTIDIM=1 AND ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND DIMENSIO.CHUTE='1';
sql.Vis:
SELECT 	ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM2 as DIAM, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS LNG, ARTICLEM.COFA,
					Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
					FAMILLE.COFA
					FROM ARTICLEM
					LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA
					LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
					LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
					WHERE  ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=7 ORDER  BY ARTICLEM.COARTI;
sql.Obsolet_Divers:
SELECT 	ARTICLEM.AMCLEUNIK,ARTICLEM.COARTI, ARTICLEM.DATESO,ARTICLEM.DESA1,ARTICLEM.ETATMAT, ARTICLEM.NUANCE, ARTICLEM.PRIXART, ARTICLEM.UnitePrix, ARTICLEM.PMP, ARTICLEM.DERNPRIX, ARTICLEM.DIM2 as DIAM, ARTICLEM.DIM1 AS LNG, ARTICLEM.COFA,
					Tech_EtatMatiere.Etat AS CODEETAT, Tech_NuanceMatiere.Nuance AS CODENUANCE,Tech_NuanceMatiere.Densite,
					FAMILLE.COFA
					FROM ARTICLEM
					LEFT JOIN FAMILLE  ON FAMILLE.COFA=ARTICLEM.COFA
					LEFT JOIN Tech_EtatMatiere  ON Tech_EtatMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.ETATMAT
					LEFT JOIN Tech_NuanceMatiere  ON Tech_NuanceMatiere.Libelle=ARTICLEM.NUANCE 
					WHERE  ARTICLEM.DATESO='' AND FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=7 OR FAMILLE.DIMENSIONS=1 ORDER  BY ARTICLEM.COARTI;
